senses.sense_definition: Reminiscent of the biblical prophet <w>Jonah</w>, often implying bad luck at sea or a miraculous survival inside a confined space.

examples.text: The superstitious crew refused to sail with him, fearing his <w>Jonahesque</w> reputation would bring a storm.
He described his three days trapped in the elevator as a <w>Jonahesque</w> experience.
